data.text:
B3: MUL not implemented in pipeline ALU — alu.vhd has no MUL case for R-type instructions. Only the MAC peripheral handles multiplication.

Suspects: alu.vhd missing case for MUL function code in R-type operations.
Fix: Add 16x16→32 multiply in alu.vhd (aluA * aluB with result split to value/hiout), or document that MUL should only be used via the MAC peripheral.
Impact: Programs using inline MUL (R-type func=1000) will produce wrong ALU results on hardware. Lower priority since MAC peripheral exists as workaround.
